/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The sky above is hazy, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are muted, with shades of gray and green dominating the palette. This image provides a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing, showcasing the city's architectural style and the rhythm of its streets.
